# Verify the cron job definition
parse
stdout 'rpc svc.Cron access=public raw=false path=/cron'
stdout 'cronJob foo name=Foo desc=Foo'

-- svc/svc.go --
package svc

import (
	"context"

	"encore.dev/cron"
)

var myCronJob = cron.Job{
    ID:          "foo",
	Name:        "Foo",
    Description: "Foo",
    Schedule:    "45 23 * * 6",
	Endpoint:    Cron,
}

//encore:api public path=/cron
func Cron(ctx context.Context) (*Response, error) {
	msg := "Hello, Cron!"
	return &Response{Message: msg}, nil
}

type Response struct {
	Message string
}
